argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) /\ x e. I ) -> Y e. X ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( I X. { Y } ) = ( x e. I |-> Y ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> ( I X. { Y } ) = ( x e. I |-> Y ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> F Fn X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dffn2 | |- ( F Fn X <-> F : X --> _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> F : X --> _V ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_feqmptd | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> F = ( y e. X |-> ( F ` y ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( y = Y -> ( F ` y ) = ( F ` Y ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 7, 8 | #P_fmptco | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> ( F o. ( I X. { Y } ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( F ` Y ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( I X. { ( F ` Y ) } ) = ( x e. I |-> ( F ` Y ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ Y e. X ) -> ( F o. ( I X. { Y } ) ) = ( I X. { ( F ` Y ) } ) ) |
